item.title: Edison’s Power Lines Were Under Strain 14 Hours Before Eaton Fire
item.description: New data suggests there were faults on Southern California Edison’s transmission lines early on Jan. 7 before the fire started that evening.

item.title: Medical Research at Columbia Is Imperiled After Trump Terminates Funding
item.description: Dozens of medical and scientific studies are ending or at risk of ending, leaving researchers scrambling to find alternative funding.
